title: Oded Ezer Design Studio News
content:
-----------------------------------------------------   
Oded Ezer Design Studio News 17/04/2002   
-----------------------------------------------------   
Font samples pages (pdf format) of our Hebrew font collection are now available !   
Contact [fonts@ezerdesign.com](mailto:fonts@ezerdesign.com) and get it by e-mail, or visit our web site at:   
 [http://www.ezerdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020145244/http:/www.ezerdesign.com/)  
you are invited !
author: Oded Ezer
